amendment.description: To provide for the establishment of a reserve fund concerning pandemic influenza preparedness planning.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3114 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 99 - 1. Record Vote Number: 56.

action.text: Amendment SA 3114 proposed by Senator Burr. (consideration: CR S2231-2232, S2241; text: CR S2231) To provide for the establishment of a reserve fund concerning pandemic influenza preparedness planning.
